summary: The customer asked about Contoso Wireless's streaming product, including the streaming quality, type of content available, and access across devices. The agent answered that the streaming quality is high, there is a wide variety of content available, and that it can be accessed on both phones and computers with an app. The agent also mentioned that there is no limit to how much content can be streamed, users can save content to watch later with an account, and customer support is available 24/7.
